page.title: 03Employment in Haddenham
page.content: 700 years ago many people in the village{worked on farms}or as blacksmiths, wheelwrights and other such jobs. Nowadays there are{large {factories in Haddenham}and many people work in the village, although not all of them live there. As more people own cars, firms are providing company vehicles and{people {are travelling 80km to work.}Since 1963, when the local station closed, less people use trains to get to work, but many{people who work locally {are now cycling. There has been an increase in the number of people who are{self employed although{selling products, industry {and education}are still the three main jobs. Expanding industries are{computing and communications. The number of people who are unemployed has increased.
